text: Hitler Strikes Poland: Blitzkrieg, Ideology, and Atrocity is a 2003 book by Alexander B. Rossino about the German invasion of Poland and its subsequent occupation. ==References== ==External links== * Gordon, Craig A. (4 December 2003). "The Goblin at War". The New York Review of Books. Category:2003 non- fiction books Category:History books about Poland Category:History books about World War II Category:21st-century history books
title: Hitler Strikes Poland
